TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Worked Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city is currently working.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Worked Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city is currently working.

TEXT.English: When checked, BUG will look for SVN updates and/or releases each time you launch Civilization and notify you when new ones are found.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, BUG will look for SVN updates and/or releases each time you launch Civilization and notify you when new ones are found.

TEXT.English: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.
TEXT.Chinese: When selected, shows the technology's associated era.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Members tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays extra information on the Members tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, puts anger countdown on city screen.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, puts anger countdown on city screen.

TEXT.English: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory
TEXT.Chinese: Turn on or off paging out of off-focus graphics to save memory

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the technology each type of great person will research.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the technology each type of great person will research.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Victories tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays extra information on the Victories tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays wonders on the BUG version of the Wonders tab using the owning player's color.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays only the corporations that are present in the city and allows for more than seven corporations.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the UHV progress after the UHV is completed/failed.[NEWLINE]NOTE: Some UHV counters do not update anymore after completion/failure.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the UHV progress after the UHV is completed/failed.[NEWLINE]NOTE: Some UHV counters do not update anymore after completion/failure.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the BUG Option Screen button.

TEXT.English: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, selecting a military unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays graphs are displayed in Log(10) scale.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays graphs are displayed in Log(10) scale.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time the decay information is first displayed.

TEXT.English: Determines how many GP types to display in the GP Progress Bar. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] setting also displays the percent chance for each.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines how many GP types to display in the GP Progress Bar. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Maximum[COLOR_REVERT] setting also displays the percent chance for each.

TEXT.English: Select what information about the completion of the UHV is displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: Select what information about the completion of the UHV is displayed.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a message about Alt + Ctrl + O when a game is started or loaded.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays a message about Alt + Ctrl + O when a game is started or loaded.

TEXT.English: When checked, each log file message includes the current time in HH:MM:SS format.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, each log file message includes the current time in HH:MM:SS format.

TEXT.English: Location where BUG files are installed.
TEXT.Chinese: Location where BUG files are installed.

TEXT.English: Determines the Raw Yields view used when Civ is started.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines the Raw Yields view used when Civ is started.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Units decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 10 turns.
TEXT.Chinese: Select the number of turns before a unit will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Units decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 10 turns.

TEXT.English: Selects which logging messages get printed to the PythonDbg.log file. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.Chinese: Selects which logging messages get printed to the PythonDbg.log file. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Production[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_PRODUCTION] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Production[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_PRODUCTION] sources and modifiers.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays extra information on the Religious tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays extra information on the Religious tab.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count All Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts all tiles in the city radius regardless of owner.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count All Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts all tiles in the city radius regardless of owner.

TEXT.English: Revision number of the BUG repository.
TEXT.Chinese: Revision number of the BUG repository.

TEXT.English: When checked, the lists of units, buildings, technologies, etc. are sorted.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the lists of units, buildings, technologies, etc. are sorted.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the progress and city of the next Great Person.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the progress and city of the next Great Person.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the Field of View value is remembered from game to game.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the remaining turns in cyan for items that have been started.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a yellow exclamation point (!) next to items in the build queue that are close to decaying from being left in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for too long. Two red exclamation points signify that the item will decay this turn if it is not first in the queue.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays a yellow exclamation point (!) next to items in the build queue that are close to decaying from being left in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for too long. Two red exclamation points signify that the item will decay this turn if it is not first in the queue.

TEXT.English: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Buildings decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 50 turns. Projects never decay.
TEXT.Chinese: Select the number of turns before a building will decay at which time a yellow exclamation mark is shown. Buildings decay after being in the queue without adding [ICON_PRODUCTION] for 50 turns. Projects never decay.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays arrows to cycle through cities above your civ's flag.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays arrows to cycle through cities above your civ's flag.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the food difference generated per turn (plus or minus) and the number of turns until starvation when the food supply is shrinking.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the food difference generated per turn (plus or minus) and the number of turns until starvation when the food supply is shrinking.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays improvements on Stats tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays improvements on Stats tab.

TEXT.English: Show reminder again at the end of this turn?
TEXT.Chinese: Show reminder again at the end of this turn?

TEXT.English: Determines how specialists are displayed:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Default[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists using the vanilla BtS format.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stacker[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists stacked using the Stacked Specialist mod.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevron[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists grouped into 5 (single chevron), 10 (capped chevron) and 20 (boxed capped chevron) format.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines how specialists are displayed:[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Default[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists using the vanilla BtS format.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stacker[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists stacked using the Stacked Specialist mod.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Chevron[COLOR_REVERT] - Shows specialists grouped into 5 (single chevron), 10 (capped chevron) and 20 (boxed capped chevron) format.

TEXT.English: When checked, the raw breakdowns for [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], and [ICON_COMMERCE] are displayed in the trade routes table.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the raw breakdowns for [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION], and [ICON_COMMERCE] are displayed in the trade routes table.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Food[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_FOOD] sources.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Food[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_FOOD] sources.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses improved Foreign Advisor 'Info' tab instead of default.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, uses improved Foreign Advisor 'Info' tab instead of default.

TEXT.English: Could not find the file "%s1" in the search paths. See the System tab on the BUG Options screen [ALT + CTRL + O] for details.
TEXT.Chinese: Could not find the file "%s1" in the search paths. See the System tab on the BUG Options screen [ALT + CTRL + O] for details.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays tick marks on selected progress bars that illustrate estimated future turn progress.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the Sevopedia (requires restart).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, uses the Sevopedia (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the Movement Points for a single unit as a fraction in the Info Pane.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays a slide bar which can be used to change the field of view.

TEXT.English: When checked, the width of the tech screen will be linked to your screen resolution (requires restart).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the width of the tech screen will be linked to your screen resolution (requires restart).

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the BUG Militiary Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, uses the BUG Militiary Advisor (requires restart).

TEXT.English: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.
TEXT.Chinese: Select which tiles to count in Raw Yields when Civ is started.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a progress bar for the next Great General.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays a progress bar for the next Great General.

TEXT.English: Show additional popups about events in the game for debug purposes
TEXT.Chinese: Show additional popups about events in the game for debug purposes

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count City's Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city controls.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count City's Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles the city controls.

TEXT.English: When checked, a popup to take over newborn civilizations will appear
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, a popup to take over newborn civilizations will appear

TEXT.English: Selects which logging messages get printed to the screen. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.
TEXT.Chinese: Selects which logging messages get printed to the screen. Each level includes messages of all levels below it.

TEXT.English: Stores the Field of View value
TEXT.Chinese: Stores the Field of View value

TEXT.English: Select how to display AI attitudes on the GLANCE tab: numbers, smilies, or both.
TEXT.Chinese: Select how to display AI attitudes on the GLANCE tab: numbers, smilies, or both.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays your gold rate in yellow if it is negative but not enough to drop your treasury below zero.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays your gold rate in yellow if it is negative but not enough to drop your treasury below zero.

TEXT.English: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, selecting a civilian unit in the Choose Production popup sets the city to train that unit repeatedly.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns are left before you can cancel each deal on the 'Active' tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows how many turns are left before you can cancel each deal on the 'Active' tab.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays graphs in BUG format.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays graphs in BUG format.

TEXT.English: Opens the BUG Mod help file. You can hit [ALT + CTRL + F1] from the main interface.
TEXT.Chinese: Opens the BUG Mod help file. You can hit [ALT + CTRL + F1] from the main interface.

TEXT.English: When checked, whip production overflow estimates will include the city's current [ICON_PRODUCTION].
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, whip production overflow estimates will include the city's current [ICON_PRODUCTION].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Owned Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles in the city radius owned by your civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Count Owned Tiles[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Counts the tiles in the city radius owned by your civilization.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city's borders expand.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city's borders expand.

TEXT.English: Zoom in and out by clicking on the body of the chart
TEXT.Chinese: Zoom in and out by clicking on the body of the chart

TEXT.English: Revision number of the BUG installation.
TEXT.Chinese: Revision number of the BUG installation.

TEXT.English: Opening the BUG Mod help file...
TEXT.Chinese: Opening the BUG Mod help file...

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns before and amount of decay in the hover text for units and buildings in the build queue.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the number of turns before and amount of decay in the hover text for units and buildings in the build queue.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays only the religions that are present in the city and allows for more than seven religions.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the minimum and maximum Movement Points for all selected units in the Info Pane.

TEXT.English: When checked, uses the BUG Finance Advisor (requires restart).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, uses the BUG Finance Advisor (requires restart).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays the Trade Routes for this city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Trade Routes[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays the Trade Routes for this city.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city will produce a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the number of turns until the city will produce a [ICON_GREATPEOPLE].

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the percentage chance and type of each possible [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] on the bar. The number shown is controlled by the General setting.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the percentage chance and type of each possible [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] on the bar. The number shown is controlled by the General setting.

TEXT.English: Source: Recent BUG Poll, statistical margin of error %s1.
TEXT.Chinese: Source: Recent BUG Poll, statistical margin of error %s1.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the [ICON_CITIZEN] cost and [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_GOLD] overflow for whipping and/or the [ICON_GOLD] cost for buying the item being produced in the Production Bar.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the [ICON_CITIZEN] cost and [ICON_PRODUCTION]/[ICON_GOLD] overflow for whipping and/or the [ICON_GOLD] cost for buying the item being produced in the Production Bar.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays a second pair of +/- buttons for each commerce type that set the rate to 100% and 0% respectively.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the 'Glance' tab on the Exotic Foreign Advisor screen.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the 'Glance' tab on the Exotic Foreign Advisor screen.

TEXT.English: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.
TEXT.Chinese: Select which religions should be shown in the top area of the Religion Advisor.

TEXT.English: Enter the number of turns until the reminder goes off and the message to display.
TEXT.Chinese: Enter the number of turns until the reminder goes off and the message to display.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Commerce[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_COMMERCE] sources and modifiers.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]View Raw Commerce[COLOR_REVERT][NEWLINE]Displays a breakdown of all [ICON_COMMERCE] sources and modifiers.

TEXT.English: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.
TEXT.Chinese: Determines the size of the build and action buttons in the bottom center of the screen.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the BUG version of the Wonders tab.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the BUG version of the Wonders tab.
